Class AcrossTestContextConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.test.AcrossTestContextConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.EnvironmentAware
    Deprecated. 
    favour the use of an AcrossTestContextBuilder instead

    @Deprecated
 @Configuration
 @PropertySource(value="file:${user.home}/dev-configs/across-test.properties",
                ignoreResourceNotFound=true)
public class AcrossTestContextConfiguration
extends Object
implements org.springframework.context.EnvironmentAware
    Deprecated configuration for creating an AcrossContext with the default test datasource that will also reset the database before bootstrapping.
    See Also:
    AcrossTestContextBuilder, ResetDatabaseConfigurer, TestDataSourceConfigurer
